name: part_004
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2024】ｰ COLORFUL ｰ【3DLIVE】 [C-QdqYjdArM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Momosuzu Nene perform 'Tougen Renka' in a Chinese-themed stage setting.
Instrumental transition scene with neon light effects and stage visuals.
Tokoyami Towa, Shirakami Fubuki, and Shirogane Noel perform 'Kagirinaku Haiiro e' on a monochrome stage with umbrella motifs.

subtitles.original: ひらひら舞っては散りゆく
subtitles.english: Fluttering and dancing, they fall and scatter

subtitles.original: 染められて望みのままに
subtitles.english: Dyed as you wish

subtitles.original: 口づけくらいじゃ足りないわ
subtitles.english: Just a kiss is not enough

subtitles.original: 愛に夜が明けるまで踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Let's dance in love until the night gives way to dawn

subtitles.original: ハナハナに咲いて散りゆく
subtitles.english: Blooming in flowers, then falling and scattering

subtitles.original: 揺らされてこの恋心
subtitles.english: This heart of love, swayed and shaken

subtitles.original: もしもの一つ あなたへの愛に
subtitles.english: If there's just one thing, in my love for you...

subtitles.original: この身果てるまで歌いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's sing until this body perishes

subtitles.original: 永遠に捧げましょう 嗚呼 愛に
subtitles.english: Let's offer it up eternally, ah, to love

subtitles.original: 才能なんてないからここで一生泣いているんだろう
subtitles.english: Since I have no talent, I'll probably be crying here for the rest of my life

subtitles.original: 目に映った景色の青さが羨ましく思っていた
subtitles.english: I was envious of the blueness of the scenery reflected in my eyes

subtitles.original: 路傍に転がる人生 アスファルトの温度が合ってる
subtitles.english: A life rolling by the roadside, the temperature of the asphalt suits me

subtitles.original: 迷子の顔照らす光を求め繋ぐ電波世界へと
subtitles.english: Seeking the light that illuminates the faces of lost children, connecting to the radio wave world

subtitles.original: Rainy Rainy 求めるものだけ描いた
subtitles.english: Rainy Rainy, I drew only what I desired

subtitles.original: 心閉まって待って 本当は叫びたいのよ
subtitles.english: Locking my heart away and waiting, but the truth is I want to scream

subtitles.original: Rainy Rainy 強くなりたいと願った
subtitles.english: Rainy Rainy, I wished to become stronger

subtitles.original: これは無情に散って孤独を奏でる
subtitles.english: This falls heartlessly and plays out my loneliness

subtitles.original: 指先から伝わっていく 鈍色の色
subtitles.english: The dull gray color transmitted from my fingertips

subtitles.original: 認めてはくれないの？
subtitles.english: Won't you acknowledge me?

subtitles.original: くすんでしまったの灰色に こんな才能なんてありふれもの
subtitles.english: It's become dull and gray; such talent is just a commonplace thing

subtitles.original: まだ人生終わってないから 諦めんなって誰かの声
subtitles.english: "Life isn't over yet, so don't give up," says someone's voice

subtitles.original: 見失ってしまったの藍色に 気づけなくて今も抗ってる
subtitles.english: I've lost sight of the indigo blue; failing to notice, I'm still struggling even now

subtitles.original: この感情奪い去ってよ ドロドロになってしまう前に
subtitles.english: Snatch away these emotions before they turn into a muddy mess

subtitles.original: Woah... 私だけ見て愛を伝えて
subtitles.english: Woah... look only at me and tell me of your love

subtitles.original: Woah... こんな世界とバイバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Woah... say bye-bye to a world like this

subtitles.original: Woah... 滲む思いなぞって描いた
subtitles.english: Woah... tracing the blurring thoughts, I drew

subtitles.original: Woah... 夢の形に泣いちゃった
subtitles.english: Woah... I ended up crying at the shape of my dreams

subtitles.original: 理解できると思ってた だけど現実は残酷だろう
subtitles.english: I thought I could understand, but reality is cruel, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 焦りと不安のノイズの間に 黒くなって浮かんでいる
subtitles.english: Between the noise of impatience and anxiety, it floats, turning black

subtitles.original: 退廃的なセンスと曖昧な表現なんかじゃ
subtitles.english: With a decadent sense and vague expressions...

subtitles.original: 衒った奴らの荒らしに 飲み込まれて消えていく
subtitles.english: ...you'll be swallowed by the storm of those who show off and disappear

subtitles.original: Rainy Rainy 雨が流れていくトローカー
subtitles.english: Rainy Rainy, the rain flows through the trocar

subtitles.original: 肌を濡らして残った 冷たい記憶の体温
subtitles.english: The temperature of cold memories left behind, soaking my skin

subtitles.original: Rainy Rainy 雲の隙間から覗いた
subtitles.english: Rainy Rainy, peeking through the gaps in the clouds

subtitles.original: 光が当たって届いて 体を軽くしたんだ
subtitles.english: The light hit me and reached me, making my body feel lighter

subtitles.original: 美学とかプライドとか 語る前に
subtitles.english: Before talking about aesthetics or pride...

subtitles.original: 揺れることやっていけ
subtitles.english: ...keep doing the things that sway you

subtitles.original: 焦がしてしまったの灰色に 剥げた才能一つ置いてけ
subtitles.english: It's become scorched and gray; leave behind one piece of faded talent

subtitles.original: 誰だって同じなんでしょう？ 固まってる場合じゃないでしょう？
subtitles.english: Everyone is the same, right? It's not the time to be frozen, is it?

subtitles.original: 目を開いても変わらない灰色に 気づいちゃってどうしようもないから
subtitles.english: Even when I open my eyes, it's still gray; I've realized there's nothing I can do about it

subtitles.original: それを虎視眈々と狙ってる ヴェルサイユなんて越されないよ
subtitles.english: Vigilantly aiming for that, even Versailles won't surpass me

subtitles.original: Woah... 私だけ見て愛を伝えて
subtitles.english: Woah... look only at me and tell me of your love

subtitles.original: Woah... こんな世界とバイバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: Woah... say bye-bye to a world like this

subtitles.original: Woah... 滲む思いなぞって描いた
subtitles.english: Woah... tracing the blurring thoughts, I drew

subtitles.original: Woah... 言葉の意味に泣いちゃった
subtitles.english: Woah... I ended up crying at the meaning of the words
